page.title: 18LAND USE IN IMPINGTON
page.content: THEY GROW FRUITS SUCH AS STRAWBERRIES, REDCURRANTS,BLACKCURRANTS,APPLES,PEARS ETC.THEY MAKE JAM, JELLY & MARMALADE AND FRUIT JUICES.THE DAIRY MAKES AND SELLS MILK,YOGURT,BUTTER AND THESE ARE DELIVERED TO CUSTOMER'S DOORS DAILY. THEY HAVE A FARM SHOP NEXT TO THE VILLAGE COLLEGE WERE FARM PRODUCE IS SOLD.{e)BUILDINGS:}THE DEMAND FOR HOUSING IN HISTON AND IMPINGTON IS VERY GREAT.A RECENT SURVEY IN{THE {CAMBRIDGE EVENING NEWS REPORTED HISTON {AS PEOPLE'S FIRST CHOICE.HISTON & {IMPINGTON}HAVE EXPANDED LARGELY IN THE LAST TEN YEARS.NEW HOUSING ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT UP IN EVERY POSSIBLE AREA. DIFFERENT BUILDERS SHOW CONTRAST OF STYLE ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE HOUSES WHILST INSIDES ARE SIMILAR.PRICES ARE HIGH HERE COMPARED TO THE NEIGBOURING VILLAGES.
